description: A leader of the Solt organization that works with Jiron and the others. Rag has a crush on him when he first joins up with them. He and Jiron constantly argue with one another and he falls out of favor with those on the Iron Gear. An attempt to seize the Iron Gear fails and he later puts himself in harms way, in contrast to his earlier behavior. When the landship he is on explodes everyone believes him to be dead, and secretly watching his own funeral he decides to remain out of sight of everyone.
name: Katakam Zushim
